job.title: Senior Software Engineer (PHP)
job.description: If you are a Senior Software Engineer with PHP experience please read onbrbrWe are a fintech company that is leading the charge in the digital payments industry We are located in Southern California and were established to streamline the diverse needs for businesses when making payments Our platform helps to efficiently organize payments that need to be made and puts it all into a single dashboard to make payments easily We understand that each business runs differently and has different needs so we help to automate the process and really find that our product adds value to make the process easier so that people can spend time working on other important things to help the business run and growbrbrWe are looking for a Senior Software Engineer that has experience working with PHP and a PHP framework although we prefer CodeIgniter This person will be responsible for providing efficient backend code while being highly autonomous We are looking for someone that can deliver on mission critical projects measure overall code quality and hep with testing and automation We need an engineer that can participate and provide solutions on code reviews design and participate effectively in technical discussions on how to grow our product platformbrbrTop Reasons to Work with UsbrulliSteady room for growthliliMake highend tech productsliliAwesome family like culturebrliulWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Develop software and work with a highly functional Agile teamlili Help design and implement overall best practiceslili Provide quality code and help measure quality and track overall improvementlili Develop new features to the platform while also participate in testing and documentationlili Build third party API integrations and work on custom implementationsbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrbr2 years of experience inbrulli PHPlili PHP framework CodeIgniter preferred Laravel Symfony etclili MySQLlili GITlili RESTful APIsbrliulstronguNice To Havebrustrongulli DockerKubernetes and overall CICD methodologieslili Jira and BitBucketlili Cloud technology GCPAWSbrliulSo if you are a Senior Software Engineer with PHP experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrJonathanSantoCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  JS251645591  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulJonathan Santo  Executive Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
